lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Addy Maxwell/Derek Tyler Carter/Jamil Kazmi/Jaten Collin Dimsdale/Jonathan Litten/KSUKE/Lee Rouse
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Addy Maxwell/Derek Tyler Carter/Jamil Kazmi/Jaten Collin Dimsdale/Jonathan Litten/KSUKE/Lee Rouse
[00:17.20]You've been keeping me busy,
[00:18.00]I'll take it hot right now
[00:20.60]Cause, i know that you want me
[00:22.40]From the inside out.
[00:24.40]You got me speechless,
[00:26.40]Opening my mouth.
[00:28.40]I was keeping you secret,
[00:29.40]But the word got out.
[00:31.80](You're fast, and your slow)
[00:33.40](Like cold, and your fall)
[00:35.00]You're luring me out now,
[00:37.80]Till the walls come down.
[00:38.80](You're yes, and you're no)
[00:40.20](But i'm not letting go)
[00:43.80]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[00:52.40](CONTRADICTION)
[00:58.80]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[01:06.00]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[01:13.40]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[01:28.60]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[01:43.00]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[01:49.60](You're fast, and your slow)
[01:50.80](Like cold, and your fall)
[01:53.20]You're luring me out now,
[01:54.60]Till the wall comes down.
[01:56.20](You're yes, and your no)
[01:58.20](But i'm not letting go)
[02:01.20]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[02:10.60](CONTRADICTION)
[02:16.40]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[02:23.60]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[02:31.00]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[02:45.80]I'll be your CONTRADICTION
[02:48.20](You're fast, and your slow)
[02:49.20](Like cold, and your fall)
[02:51.60](You're fast, and your slow)
[02:55.00](You're yes, and your no)
[02:57.80](But i'm not letting go)
[02:58.60](You're yes, and your no) I'll be your CONTRADICTION
tlyric:
[by:Woc我低音炮呢]
[00:17.20]你一直让我焦躁难耐
[00:18.00]我将不留余力
[00:20.60]因为，我知道你正期盼着我
[00:22.40]再次现身
[00:24.40]你使我语塞
[00:26.40]让我有口难言
[00:28.40]我尽力去隐瞒
[00:29.40]但迟早会公布于世
[00:31.80]（你极速前行，或缓缓前进）
[00:33.40]（冷酷无情，一蹶不振）
[00:35.00]你在吸引我走出
[00:37.80]直到墙壁支离破碎坍塌倒下
[00:38.80]（尽管你达成目的，但终将一无所有）
[00:40.20]（难割难舍，不愿放手）
[00:43.80]我将与你对抗
[00:52.40]（自相矛盾）
[00:58.80]我会成为你的抵触
[01:06.00]我会成为你的对立
[01:13.40]我会成为你的反驳
[01:28.60]我将与你对抗到底
[01:43.00]我将与你自相矛盾
[01:49.60]（你极速前行，或缓缓前进）
[01:50.80]（冷酷无情，一蹶不振）
[01:53.20]你在吸引我走出
[01:54.60]直到墙壁支离破碎坍塌倒下
[01:56.20]（尽管你达成目的，但终将一无所有）
[01:58.20]（难割难舍，不愿放手）
[02:01.20]我将与你对抗到底
[02:10.60]（自相矛盾）
[02:16.40]我会成为你的对立
[02:23.60]我会成为你的反驳
[02:31.00]我将与你斗争到底
[02:45.80]我会与你自相矛盾
[02:48.20]（你极速前行，或缓缓前进）
[02:49.20]（冷酷无情，一蹶不振）
[02:51.60]（你奔逸绝尘，或不疾不徐）
[02:55.00]（尽管你达成目的，但终将一无所有）
[02:57.80]（难割难舍，不愿放手）
[02:58.60]（尽管你达成目的，但终究一无所有）我将与你斗争到底
